title: Aurora Rover Platform
summary: Autonomous rover with adaptive suspension and terrain sensing.
description: Designed a six-wheel rover with adaptive suspension, onboard SLAM, and teleoperation fallback. Integrated lidar, IMU, and thermal cameras with a custom control dashboard.

title: Micro Drone Swarm
summary: Low-cost swarm with decentralized collision avoidance.
description: Prototyped a fleet of palm-sized drones using custom flight controllers and optical flow. Built decentralized collision avoidance routines with adaptive formation logic.

title: Orbital Mission Simulator
summary: Trajectory planning and orbit stability analysis.
description: Built a lightweight simulator for CubeSat deployment profiles, including orbit propagation, attitude control modeling, and thermal constraints across mission phases.

title: Rocket GNC Testbench
description: Created a modular hardware-in-the-loop bench for guidance, navigation, and control algorithms with high-rate sensor emulation and telemetry dashboards.

title: Lunar Habitat CAD
summary: Concept model for modular lunar habitat assembly.
description: Developed a CAD concept with modular pressurized volumes, robotic assembly fixtures, and environmental control routing. Delivered manufacturing drawings and assembly animations.

title: Adaptive Robotic Gripper
description: Engineered a soft-touch gripper using flexible joints and custom gear trains. Validated grasp envelopes with 3D-printed iterations and load testing.

title: Autonomy Control Dashboard
summary: Real-time telemetry and command UI for robotics ops.
description: Built a responsive dashboard with live telemetry streaming, mission timelines, and operator checklists. Integrated alerting and session playback for analysis.

title: Vision Pipeline Toolkit
summary: Reusable computer vision utilities for robotics.
description: Designed an efficient pipeline for object detection and pose estimation, with calibrated cameras, GPU acceleration, and deployable modules.
